description: Poland has some of Europe's strictest laws, but the constitutional court tightens them still further.
title: Poland abortion: Top court bans almost all terminations
title_page: Poland abortion: Top court bans almost all terminations - BBC News
maintext: Late last year a group of governing party and far-right MPs decided to ask the court to decide the issue. This was convenient because a majority of the court's judges were nominated by Law and Justice. It would also avoid a stormy and emotional parliamentary debate and accompanying anger on the streets in those pre-Covid days.
